Reviews.Title: “Dont believe the website”
Reviews.Author: Aussieguyb
Reviews.Content: recognised shown web sites hotel advertised doubt stay am singapore coffin door nearly fell bed slightly wider single bed luggage toilet properly hotel run booked 3 nights left 1 night dont stay unless desperate

Reviews.Title: “not too bad for a budget tour”
Reviews.Author: annie162
Reviews.Content: wife stay 3 days march 14 17 expensive coz tried inquired cheap hotel finally book hotel budget stay staff clean internet computer time lobbythey breakfastwhat pay perfect hotel dont book 5 star hotel

Reviews.Title: “Basic hotel in a decent location”
Reviews.Author: Vinay_Shankar
Reviews.Content: stayed family september 2011 located little india close mrt station marina bay financial district walkable distance hotel pretty windows believe common tv ac wireless internet computer reception complimentary breakfast water bought bathroom bit plenty restaurants shops ambience lively overall basic hotel serve purpose wish stay days

Reviews.Title: “tiny room, horrible bathroom”
Reviews.Author: Forek
Reviews.Content: location little india easy reach mrt note dirty surrounding recommended solo woman travellers lot hindu streets tiny bed space luggage window smelly inside bathroom expensive hostel price range hotel

Reviews.Title: “Bad service, tiny room, horrible bathroom & noisy”
Reviews.Author: Rochenstein
Reviews.Content: girlfriend stayed 3 nights expensive didnt enjoy stay tiny windows horrible musty smell result bathroom disgusting worse musty smell mould shower curtain black mould putty sealed sink wall grim bathroom cleaned 3 night stay worst receptionist book taxi 8am 745am reception taxi walk streets luggage taxi travelling asia past 3 months worst accommodation expensive bad staff grotty avoid

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Zenobia
HotelInfo.Address: No. 40-43 Upper Weld Road | Little India, Singapore 207398, Singapore
